title: Rito Please :(
body: Alright so ive gotten placed in low priority que twice this season already even though id never intentionally leave a game or dodge lobby; But since the alpha client is buggy still i will list off some of my problems, even though some dont happen anymore ive still been punished for them and they are on my record. (please note that i pay for very good internet and usually run 20 ms) when in loading screen for game i need to close league and close the background process of league because it freezes, also id like to state that ive never had to close a background process of league until the new client. also when it comes my time to ban in lobby sometime i can click a champ sometimes i cant but then i cant even lock in my ban and i get kicked for "dodging" and then i get punished. i wasnt going to say anything but it just happened again, i went to ban hecarim and i selected him and it didnt let me lock.id like to also say that i dont run the program in full screen because it would cause more problems imo. Riot please incorporate something so i dont get placed in low priority que because your client decides to fuck up on me....

replies.body:
The updated client is still in testing, so it's okay to continue your ranked through the legacy client for now:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

It sounds like you're having a connection problem that's failing to communicate what's going on in champion select, and leaving you behind.  You should go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network to the server and stay in champion select and in-game.  You should test it in custom games to prevent any penalties and be sure.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Its nothing on my end, its the client itself. i dont need to "tune up" my network, its grade A and ive allowed league through my firewall and nothing is blocking it on my end. please dont try to say im having a connection problem because i literally took a picture of league doing what its been doing and also in the same frame is my network connection at full bars. i cant sit through an hour of reversing to the legacy client because i want to play a couple games of league. i know its not you who programs this stuff and youre just trying to help me out but please please do what you can to let someone know of this issue. im not the only one it affects

i did, and it just happened again, "attempting to reconnect" 30 seconds earlier i picked my ban and then it was my turn to pick so i picked and hit lock, then it didnt register and ive been kicked again, if i get a 3rd lower priority que i might just forever quit league becuase im getting punished for (not your mistakes" but the programmers and people who developed this client and released it before it was ready. this is bullshit and im super tilted now. and ive played for 3-4 years.. this is the most trouble ive gon through. and you cant really expect me to sit through 20-40 minutes of "updating interface" to revert to the OLD client, the one that is suppose to be outdated. im not trying to give whoever has to read this a hard time, im just tilted. i know its not your fault.
